class_notes: Student must seek permission to enroll from Dr. Drumhiller at hankdrum@aol.com or have completed NRSG 513.
course_description: Students expand their communication skills and cultural knowledge helpful for interacting with Spanish-speaking patients.  The course is conversation intensive, e.g., role-play and mock interviews.
sections: Class Nbr: 5663, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 6-7:50p, Instructor: M. Drumhiller, Status: Open
